subject: Divorce, Separations and Annulments
Baseball
lead_paragraph: As the separation of Frank and Jamie McCourt — one the team’s owner and the other its chief executive officer — became public, it raised the question of how it will affect the team.
snippet: As the separation of Frank and Jamie McCourt — one the team’s owner and the other its chief executive officer — became public, it raised the question of how it will affect the team.
